longBusinessSummary: EIH Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns and manages hotels and cruisers under the Oberoi and Resorts brand names in India and internationally. It also owns and operates Oberoi Flight Services and Oberoi Airport Services, which provide catering and other services to international airlines; operates restaurants and lounges in various airports; and provides air charter, car rental, and project management services, as well as operates the Maidens Hotel in Delhi. In addition, the company engages in renting of investment properties. EIH Limited was incorporated in 1949 and is based in Delhi, India.
